main_definition: In the context of online communication, trackbacks are notifications sent to a weblog indicating that it has referenced another blog post.

meanings_and_examples.definition: References or acknowledgements in blog comments linking back to other posts
meanings_and_examples.example: When Sarah commented on John's blog post, she included a trackback pointing to her original article.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A feature used by some weblogs for inter-blog communication and notification of incoming links or references
meanings_and_examples.example: The website owner set up trackbacks on their blog to automatically notify them when others reference their content.
